name: ePayco plugin for WooCommerce
author: ePayco

sections.description:
ePayco helps you grow your business with rates tailored to your needs.
Receive payments, accept credit cards, deposits, and transfers.

Additional Info

Contribute to the repository on GitHub
Visit the GitHub repository
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin.
  2. Enter the administrator of your WordPress.
  3. Navigate to Plugins / Add New / Upload Plugin.
  4. Find the plugin downloaded on your computer and upload it like any other file.
  5. After installing the .zip file, it will appear in your list of installed plugins, where it can be activated or deactivated.
  6. To configure the plugin, navigate to WooCommerce / Settings / Payments and locate the ePayco tab.
  7. Configure the plugin by entering P_CUST_ID_CLIENTE, P_KEY, PUBLIC_KEY, and PRIVATE_KEY provided by ePayco.
  8. Save changes. If the configuration is incorrect, a warning will be displayed. Pay attention to this.
sections.faq:
What types of payment methods do they receive?

We accept credit cards, debit cards, cash, deposits, and transfers.

Are you required to use an SSL certificate?

Yes. It is advisable to use an SSL certificate as it is crucial for browser security.
sections.changelog:
8.1.0

  • Updated version with new features and improvements.
